title: One dead in shooting near Family Dollar in Pine Hills
content:
One person was killed and two others injured in a shooting in a Family Dollar parking lot in Pine Hills, according to the Orange County Sheriff's Office.
The shooting was reported just before 4:45 p.m. near North Hiawassee and Clarcona Ocoee roads, Dep. Rose Silva said.
Silva said people in two parked vehicles started shooting at each other. Both vehicles fled.
A man and woman were found shot in one vehicle. Their conditions are unknown, Silva said.
A man was found in the other vehicle and he was pronounced dead.
The conditions, names, and ages of the people shot were not immediately available.
